mapper.insert: insert into order(order_no, uid, point_down, postcode, addr, dt_addr, ex_addr, request) values(${orderNo}, #{uid}, ${pointDown}, ${postcode}, #{addr}, #{dtAddr}, #{exAddr}, #{request})
insert into order_product(order_no, prod_name, price, amount) values(${orderNo}, #{prodName}, ${price}, ${amount})
